data.name: Understanding, The Game
data.detailed_description:
** IMPORTANT ANNOUNCEMENT NOV 13 , 2021 **

After such a fantastic reception and an outpouring of support, we've decided to create a new story utilizing all the valuable feedback from our audience. "The Cult of Chanseville" is the sequel to our first short survival horror game, "Understanding, the Game."

NEW STORE LINK --> CLICK HERE! -- NEW DEMO COMING SOON!!

(The Cult of Chanseville) is a twisted adventure into the deepest, darkest secrets that haunt the city.

Both the good and bad reviews helped me a lot in making this decision ... we really thank everyone who played this little game from the bottom of our hearts!

- I apologize for the glitches / problems that the game presented and people are still very supportive

many thanks to the

720,000+ people who visited the store.

50,000+ additions to the library

9000+ additions to the wish list!

I really have no way of thanking you all! see you soon ;)

**THIS GAME IS NOT MORE IN DEVELOPMENT, WE INVITE YOU TO PLAY OUR NEW DEMO "The Cult of Chanseville" THANKS EVERYONE FOR ALL THE SUPPORT DURING THIS YEAR**


About the Game

** IMPORTANT ANNOUNCEMENT N°3 : ** Important Announcement PROJECT STATUS && ROAD TO EVA!! <--- click here

** IMPORTANT ANNOUNCEMENT N°2 : ** 617.000 THANKS! , NEWS && PROJECT STATUS** 28 APRIL <--- click here

** IMPORTANT ANNOUNCEMENT : **DEMO HOTFIX** 7 JANUARY <--- click here

OFFICIAL GAME INSTAGRAM : @matygex_games

HOW TO PLAY / COMO JUGAR :



********RIGHT CLICK = USE KEYS ON DOORS********
F11 = FULL SCREEN / NO FULL SCREEN
Left Mouse Button = Use
F = Flashlight
SHIFT = Run.
W, A, S, D = Movement
Right Mouse Button = Use Keys on doors,
Knoc Knoc doors
Space = Jump
Ctrl = Crouch
Tab = Inventory/Journal
M or ESC = Menu
Middle Mouse Button = Focus

-You play as Myrko, an investigator who has lost his girlfriend during a strange event several years ago, you arrive in Chanseville City to investigate the disappearance of tourists there. in this demo we arrive at a strange complex, where we do not know anything or how we should move forward... despair can become our worst enemy.



**THIS GAME IS NOT MORE IN DEVELOPMENT, WE INVITE YOU TO PLAY OUR NEW DEMO "The Cult of Chanseville" THANKS EVERYONE FOR ALL THE SUPPORT DURING THIS YEAR, I HAVE NO WORDS TO SAY THANKS!!!**

[Understanding, The Game] uses the Unreal® Engine. Unreal® is a trademark or registered trademark of Epic Games, Inc. in the United States of America and elsewhere.

data.short_description: 'Understanding, the game' it's a suspense/investigation horror indie game inspired in classic horror games! Full Game coming as soon we can! Help us grow the game!
data.supported_languages:
English*, Spanish - Latin America, Spanish - Spain
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: windows 7, 10
  • Processor: Intel(R) Pentium(R) G620@2.60ghz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: requires graphics card. minimum GPU needed: "AMD Radeon r7 200 series" or similar
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: windows 10
  • Processor: intel i5 7400 or higher
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nvidia gtx 1050 ti, or higher
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
